title: a building solely used for the purpose of a drama or cinema theatre, a drive-in-theatre, an assembly hall or auditorium, an exhibition hall, theatre museum, a stadium, a "Mangal Karyalaya", exceeding built-up area of1000 sq
clause_text: a building solely used for the purpose of a drama or cinema theatre, a drive-in-theatre, an assembly hall or auditorium, an exhibition hall, theatre museum, a stadium, a "Mangal Karyalaya", exceeding built-up area of1000 sq. m or where the built-up area of such a user exceeds 1000 sq. m in the case of mixed occupancies;
